page.title: 12Recreation of...............
page.content: Junior children in Hurworth.In the junior school(7-11), 45% of children are brownies, cubs, guides or scouts.They attend them once a week. The most popular sport with the children is swimming.Of 178 juniors, 10% are members of a swimming club and 54% swim at the Dolphin Centre.The most popular recreation at home is watching television.Playing with toys and reading are 2nd and 3rd prefer- ences.Many children enjoy collecting things such as stamps, dolls, erasers and badges. 14.6% attend private music lessons. The piano is the most popular and then violin. When the children play with friends on the evening they enjoy bike rides, football, walking, hide and seek and exploring! Some families like to play sport together. These include cricket, badminton and swimming.
